name: Octopush
description:
I am a cyborg girl with tentacle arms in my back. Oh, and I have a cyborg eye as well. Monsters beware!

Octopush was made for Power Gamejam hosted by Guildford Game Jammers (18/May/2018). Game took two full days to make (split in three days time).

Everything was made from scratch for the jam by me, with the awesome help of Pablo Lopez Soriano that did character art for the player. 

This game was very fun to make and this is the most amount of content that I have ever pulled in two days, so I am feeling happy about the result.

If font is not displaying correctly for the robot text, download this font: https://www.dafont.com/joystix.font (its a good font!)
